<script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div       window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS = window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS || {};
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.autoChangeImages = true;
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.screenWidths = [['desktop', 1065], ['tablet', 768], ['smart_horizontal', 360], ['smart', 0]];
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.thumborUrl = "";
    </script><script>
    (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);
  </script><style type="text/css">.regua-navegacao,.regua-navegacao-tab,.has-regua .barra-globocom{display:none}.regua-svg-container{height:0;width:0;position:absolute;left:-999999px}</style><div e.prototype.insertJsOnScriptTag=function(e,n,t){var o;return t&&(n+="\n//# sourceMappingURL="+t),o=document.createTextNode(n),e.appendChild(o)},e.prototype.injectScriptTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),r.src=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectScript=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),this.insertJsOnScriptTag(r,n,o),f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectLinkTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>


<!--END content for url: http://sportv.globo.com/servico/sportv/nba/header.html-->



<!-- END SSI fork for esi or beo -->

<!-- End licensee_global_navigation -->
       <!--SSI /frags/licensee_content_top_banner.html -->
       <!-- Start Licensee Content Top Banner Fragment -->

                  <div data-ng-controller="TeamListCtrl">
  <sib-page-header data-sib-title="_page.teamIndex" ></sib-page-header>
  <section class='team-index'>
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-12">
        
<!-- Start Team List Module -->
<div class="sib-list sib-team-list" data-ng-cloak>
  <div data-ng-repeat="(conferenceKey, conference) in conferences">
    <a name="{{ conferenceKey.toLowerCase() }}"></a>
    <div class="list-title">
      <img data-ng-src="/media/img/{{ conferenceKey.toLowerCase() }}_logo.png" alt="{{ conferenceKey }} Conference" />
      <span> {{'allTeams.' + conferenceKey.toLowerCase()|i18next}} {{'allTeams.conferenceTitle'|i18next}}</span>
    </div>
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-lg-4 col-sm-4 col-12 division" data-ng-repeat="(key, division) in conference.divisions">
        <div class="division-label">
          <span data-ng-bind-html="key"></span>
        </div>
        <div class="team" data-ng-repeat="team in division">
          <div class="img">

              <sib-img-team class="team-img" team-abbr="team.abbr| earlyTeamChange:'imgAbbr' "></sib-img-team>
            </a>
          </div>
          <div class="team-info">
            <a sib-team-urls team="team" data-ng-href="/teams/#!/{{ team.code }} "><span class="name"><span data-ng-bind-html="team.city"></span> <span data-ng-bind-html="team.name | earlyTeamChange:'name'"></span></span></a>
            <div>
              <a data-ng-href="/teams/stats/#!/{{ team.code }}" data-ng-i18next="allTeams.links.stats"></a>
              <a data-ng-href="/teams/leaders/#!/{{ team.code }}" data-ng-i18next="allTeams.links.leaders"></a>
            </div>
            <div>
              <a data-ng-href="/teams/roster/#!/{{ team.code }}" data-ng-i18next="allTeams.links.roster"></a>
              <a data-ng-href="/teams/schedule/#!/{{ team.code }}" data-ng-i18next="allTeams.links.schedule"></a>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>  
      </div>
    </div>

        <div class='col-sm-4'><a href="http://watch.nba.com/channel/nbatvlive" data-ng-i18next="navbar.nbaTv"></a></div>

        <div class='col-sm-4'><a href="http://watch.nba.com/packages" data-ng-i18next="navbar.platforms"></a></div>
        <div class='col-sm-4'><a href="http://watch.nba.com/packages" data-ng-i18next="navbar.packages"></a></div>
        <div class='col-sm-4'><a href="http://support.watch.nba.com" data-ng-i18next="navbar.support"></a></div>
        <div class='col-sm-4 hidden-all-sites show-mi'><a href="/key-dates/">Key Dates</a></div>
        <div class='col-sm-4 hidden-all-sites show-mi'><a href="/nba-apps/">NBA Apps</a></div>
        <div class='col-sm-4 hidden-all-sites show-mi'><a href="http://www.nba.com/global/storelinkhandler.html"  data-ng-i18next="_page.store"></a></div>        
      </div>
    </div> 
    <p class='copyright clear-fix' data-ng-i18next="[html]footer"></p>
  </div>
</div>

 -->

		}
		function abrir(){
			document.getElementById('popup').style.display = 'block';

    <script>
	(function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
	(i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
	m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
	})(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');
	
	ga('create', 'UA-39614547-1', 'auto');
	ga('send', 'pageview');
	var sendForm = document.getElementById('btn_contact');
	addListener(sendForm, 'click', function() {
		ga('send', 'event', 'Contato', 'Enviar', '');
	   /*ga('send', {
	  'hitType': 'event', // Required.
	  'eventCategory': 'Contato', // Required.
	  'eventAction': 'Enviar', // Required.
	  'eventLabel': ''
	});*/
	});
	
	
	/**
	 * Utility to wrap the different behaviors between W3C-compliant browsers
	 * and IE when adding event handlers.
	 *
	 * @param {Object} element Object on which to attach the event listener.
	 * @param {string} type A string representing the event type to listen for
	 *     (e.g. load, click, etc.).
	 * @param {function()} callback The function that receives the notification.
	 */
	function addListener(element, type, callback) {
	 if (element.addEventListener) element.addEventListener(type, callback);
	 else if (element.attachEvent) element.attachEvent('on' + type, callback);
	}

</script>    <!--Start of Zopim Live Chat Script-->

_.push(o)};z._=[];z.set._=[];$.async=!0;$.setAttribute("charset","utf-8");

						<h2 class="indent-1">Web <span>to Print</span></h2>
                        <div class="span3" style="margin-top:0px;">
                        	<img src="img/web-to-print-home.png" width="270" height="288"/>
                        </div>
                        <div class="span5">
                        	<p>Nossa solução <b>Web to Print</b> permite que você disponibilize seus produtos na internet e que seus clientes criem, editem e aprovem tudo através do computador. Você recebe um arquivo PDF para imprimir o produto do cliente.</p>
                            <p>É composto por:</p>
                            <ul class="list">
                            	<li><h3><a href="loja-virtual.php" title="Web to Print - Loja Virtual">Loja Virtual</a></h3></li>
                                <li><h3><a href="central-de-personalizacao.php" title="Web to Print - Central de Personalização">Central de Personalização</a></h3></li>

                            </ul>
                            <a href="web-to-print.php" class="btn" title="Web to Print"><span>SAIBA MAIS</span></a>
                        </div>
					</div>
					<div class="span3">
						<h2 class="indent-1">B2B <span>Corporate</span></h2><br/>
						<p class="lead">O Print One Corporate &eacute; uma Plataforma completa para gerenciamento de Pedidos e demandas de clientes/produtos.</p>
						<p>A Plataforma Corporate &eacute; destinada a empresas ou fornecedores que necessitam gerenciar pedidos e entregas a clientes internos e externo.</p>
                        <a href="b2b-corporate.php" class="btn" title="B2B Corporate"><span>SAIBA MAIS</span></a>
					</div>

			<div class="row">
            	<div class="block-2">
                    <div class="span3">
                        <h2 class="indent-1">Sobre <span>Nós</span></h2><br/>
                        <p class="lead font-1">Somos a <b>Print One</b>. <br/>Uma empresa inovadora com expertise na criação de ambientes <b>Web to Print</b>.</p>
                        Nossa solução <b>Web to Print</b> permite que você disponibilize seus produtos na internet e que seus clientes criem, editem e aprovem tudo através do computador. Você recebe um arquivo PDF para imprimir o produto do cliente.<br/>
                        <a href="print-one.php" class="btn" title="Print One"><span>SAIBA MAIS</span></a>

                            <li>Editoras</li>        
                            <li>Ag&ecirc;ncias de Publicidade</li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>

		$(document).r
